description:
We offer a unique free offline Bible study tool that you can learn and share the Holy Bible on your own or with your trusted bible study group. Comparing to traditional Holy Bible, our e-bible allows you to access Holy Bible easily on your digital devices without carrying paper book around, listen to Bible verses while driving and running, or take challenges of biblical quizzes and crosswords. 

Our KJV Bible App is a Fast, light, free offline bible for your daily study. It allows you to quickly locate Holy Bible verse with a simple tap and create your own Holy Bible verse highlights, bookmark and verse picture.

Please join our virtual bible study group to explore Bible with more than 10 million people who have downloaded our KJV Holy Bible App worldwide. Get yourself closer to God and listen to God's word at any time by using our pocket Holy Bible App.

----Feature ----

BEST AUDIO FOR BIBLE PLAN
-Various Bible verse audio of King James Version KJV.
-Classic bible plan audio that you can listen to God's word.
-Listen to your favorite Bible verses whenever you are unable to read while driving, running and strolling.
-Let God's word put you to sleep at night.

THE BEST BIBLE STUDY TOOL
-Access to Holy Bible anytime anywhere just by swiping screen.
-Offline Bibles: Read and study Bible verse WITHOUT internet access.
-Search the Bible with keywords.
-Quickly locate verse.
-Share your Bible verse with your friends anytime anywhere with ease.
-Highlight verses you like for future bible study.
-Note your inspirations.
-Have fun with our selected bible quizzes and crosswords challenges.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR FREE BIBLE
-Font adjustment: choose any font size and line spacings you want.
-Night mode: change to night mode when you read the Bible at night.
-Share verses with your friends via social platforms with ease.
-Verses Image: Customize fantastic Bible verse images.

READ BIBLE DAILY
-Connect to God's word with our one-of-a-kind pocket Holy Bible App.
-Fantastic Bible reading experience.
-Use this free Bible for your daily devotional study and Christian Bible reading.
-Read with your religious community and share your thoughts together.

To have access to the Ad-Free Version, you can choose a monthly remove ads subscription. This recurring transaction will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of your subscription. Renewals will be charged the same cost within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Meloshort: Your Ultimate Destination for Popular Short Dramas and Must-Watch Mini-Series

In today’s fast-paced world, finding time to unwind and enjoy quality entertainment can be a challenge. That’s where Meloshort comes in — the ultimate app designed specifically for busy viewers like you, who crave engaging stories but have limited time. With episodes lasting just 1 to 2 minutes, Meloshort offers a vast and diverse library of popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series that perfectly fit into your fragmented schedule.
Whether you are commuting, grabbing a quick coffee break, or just squeezing in some entertainment between daily tasks, Meloshort lets you dive into cinematic-quality storytelling anytime, anywhere. Experience the grandeur of ancient costume dramas, the sweetness and charm of modern romances, the thrill of intense boss hero stories, or the gripping suspense of revenge thrillers — all in beautifully produced HD formats that bring these worlds to life on your screen.

Diverse Genres to Match Every Mood
Our ever-expanding collection covers a rich variety of genres, ensuring there is something for everyone:
- Sweet Pet Romance: Heartwarming stories filled with adorable love and tender moments.
- Emotional Sadomasochistic Passion: Complex, intense relationships full of raw emotion and drama.
- Thrilling Suspense Mysteries: Edge-of-your-seat narratives packed with twists and turns.
- Heartfelt Campus Stories: Relatable tales of youth, friendship, and first love.
- Urban Emotional Dramas: Deeply engaging stories that explore the complexities of modern city life.
With new episodes and series added every week, your watchlist will never run dry. Our smart recommendation engine learns your tastes and suggests fresh content tailored just for you, helping you discover your next favorite popular short drama or must-watch mini-series effortlessly.

Features Tailored for Your Viewing Pleasure
Meloshort isn’t just about great stories — it’s about making your viewing experience smooth, personalized, and enjoyable. Some of our key features include:
- Playback Speed Control: Adjust episode speed to match your viewing pace — slow down to savor moments or speed up when you’re short on time.
- Personal Watchlist: Easily organize and keep track of all the mini-series you want to watch.
- User-Friendly Interface: Navigate effortlessly through a sleek, intuitive design with stunning HD visuals that make every episode a pleasure to watch.

Global Appeal and Accessibility
Recognizing the global audience we serve, Meloshort supports:
- Multilingual Subtitles: Catering to viewers worldwide by providing subtitles in multiple languages.
- Localized Dubbing: Enjoy your favorite dramas in your native language with high-quality dubbing options.
From palace intrigues and CEO romances to campus crushes and emotional urban tales, Meloshort delivers a rich tapestry of stories that resonate across cultures and geographies.

Why Choose Meloshort?
- Optimized for Busy Lives: Episodes last just 1-2 minutes, perfect for watching on the go or during short breaks.
- High-Quality Content: Each drama is carefully selected or produced with cinematic quality, offering you an immersive viewing experience.
- Constantly Updated Library: Fresh content added weekly keeps the excitement alive and your watchlist full.
- Smart Recommendations: Our intelligent algorithm helps you find exactly the kinds of shows you’ll love.

Download Meloshort Today!
Join millions of viewers worldwide who have made Meloshort their go-to app for bite-sized entertainment. Experience fast, high-quality storytelling designed perfectly for your busy lifestyle. Download Meloshort now, start exploring the hottest popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series, and never miss a moment of great storytelling again!

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/meloshort/home/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://sites.google.com/view/meloshort/home/terms-of-use

The New King James Version Bible is an English translation of the Bible.
 
The New King James Version (NKJV) is one of the most famous Bible versions of all and also a more simplified version of KJV without changing its accuracy. It is also widely used among English-speaking Christians in churches and for personal study.
 
The NKJV app teaches us the parables of Jesus Christ, focusing on love, compassion, and forgiveness. It includes an audio Bible option for those who have difficulty reading. The Bible is available in different formats like the NKJV study Bible, NKJV printed books, and a version designed for kids.
 
Features:
- Audio Bible - Listen to the words of the Bible Scriptures.
 
- Daily Verse - Once you set the reminder, you will receive day-to-day notifications to read your daily Bible verses.
 
- MY LIBRARY - It is like the personal space for the user, as it contains all the highlighted points and notes you make from reading the Bible. You can also bookmark the best Bible verses that you love.
 
- Our Bible app contains both the Old and New Testaments.
 
- Verse Editor - Bible verses paired with beautiful background images. Choose your favorite verse, match it with a suitable image, create your post, and share it with friends and family on social media.
 
- Nearby churches - The app provides information about nearby churches based on your location.
 
- EBooks - We offer a wide selection of Christian eBooks for your reading.
 
- Wallpapers - Many beautiful varieties are available.


- Videos - It has videos on so many topics, such as Jesus, Sad, Hope, Blessings, Alone, Wisdom, Motivation, Gratitude, Blessings, God’s Promises, forgiveness, healing, and considerably more.
 
- Festive Calendar - It contains all the Christian festivals and feasts.
 
- Popular verse -  We have Bible verses arranged by topics like love, fear, peace, and much more.
 
- Church Laws  - This includes church etiquette such as standing, greeting, respectful conduct, following social and prophetic laws and more.

- Customise Your Bible- You can change the font and colour of the text according to your preference. Make your online Bible reading a comfortable space for you.
 
- 1000 Praises - ‘1000 Praises’ is a devotional recitation honouring God through a thousand titles and attributes.
 
- Bible Quotes - It has the best Bible quotes in the form of images and text that can be shared on social media with your friends and family.
 
- Bible Quiz - Test your knowledge with the Bible Quiz.

Discover the "Holy Bible" App - Your Gateway to Spiritual Growth
Embark on a transformative faith journey with the "Holy Bible" app, a powerful companion designed to uplift and inspire. Immerse yourself in endless possibilities as you explore captivating features to enhance your spiritual experience. From engaging Bible study sessions to enlightening conversations with an AI priest, from exhilarating trivia quizzes to serene moments of prayer, "Holy Bible" is the ultimate app for every devout believer.
Unlock the Power of Prayer
Experience a profound connection with the divine through the app's immersive prayer platform. Engage in morning and night prayers with carefully curated verses and uplifting prayers that resonate with your heart's desires. Connect with God anytime, anywhere, and express your thoughts and aspirations.
Elevate Your Bible Reading
Immerse yourself in the wisdom of the Bible with the personalized reading experience. Tailor your journey to suit your preferences by creating notes, highlights, and bookmarks. Whether you're at the gym or enjoying a moment of tranquility, listen to Bible audios to enrich your understanding. With offline access, delve into scriptures without relying on a network connection.
Enlightenment With AI Priest
Engage with your AI priest through the app. Seamlessly blend technology with spirituality as you receive invaluable guidance and answers to your deepest questions. This feature facilitates Bible study and supports clarity on your spiritual path.
Ignite Your Mind with Bible Quiz
Stimulate your intellect and relax your soul with Bible trivia quizzes. Whether you seek a momentary escape or a brain-teasing challenge, the app offers an array of quizzes to test your knowledge while providing a well-deserved respite. Unwind, recharge, and deepen your connection to the Word in an interactive way.
Embrace Guided Study Plans
Cultivate a consistent study and prayer routine with the comprehensive plans. Choose from themed study plans for personal growth. Receive reminders and notifications to nourish your soul with divine wisdom.
Immerse Yourself in Bible Jigsaw
Experience the beauty of churches around the world through captivating Bible quiz games and activities. Collect jigsaw pieces, unlocking stunning views of churches. Let the splendor of these images further enrich your spiritual exploration.
Record Your Journey With God
Capture the essence of your spiritual odyssey using the app. Document your interactions with God, cherishing every moment spent seeking His heart and communicating through prayer. Witness the transformative power of devotion.
Key Features:
- Personalize prayer experience and communicate directly with God.
- Engage in insightful conversations with your AI priest, exploring biblical knowledge.
- Test your learning and deepen understanding with engaging Bible quizzes.
- Foster a commitment to study and personal growth with supportive features.
- Share impactful verses with friends and loved ones effortlessly.
- Create visually stunning scripture-sharing images.
- Develop a daily habit of study and prayer through the habit-forming function.
- Immerse yourself in personalized reading experiences, choosing fonts, backgrounds, and generating personalized notes.
- Experience the Bible come to life with the audio version, perfect for moments of relaxation or exercise.
- Embark on theme-based study plans, deepening understanding.
- Track your spiritual growth, celebrating progress.

The Bible (from Koine Greek τα βιβλία, tà biblía, "the books") is a collection of texts sacred in Judaism and Christianity. There is no single "Bible" and many Bibles with varying contents exist. Various religious traditions have produced different recensions with different selections of texts. These do largely overlap however, creating a common core.

List of chapters (Old Testament): 
Genesis, Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers, Deuteronomy, Joshua, Judges, Ruth, 1 Samuel, 2 Samuel, 1 Kings, 2 Kings, 1 Chronicles, 2 Chronicles, Ezra, Nehemiah, Tobit, Judith, Esther, Job, Psalms, 1 Maccabees, 2 Maccabees, Proverbs, Ecclesiastes, Song of Solomon, Wisdom of Solomon, Ecclesiasticus, Isaiah, Jeremiah, Lamentations, Baruch, Ezekiel, Daniel, Hosea, Joel, Amos, Obadiah, Jonah, Micah, Nahum, Habakkuk, Zephaniah, Haggai, Zechariah, Malachi

List of chapters (New Testament): 
Matthew, Mark, Luke, John, Acts, Romans, 1 Corinthians, 2 Corinthians, Galatians, Ephesians, Philippians, Colossians, 1 Thessalonians, 2 Thessalonians, 1 Timothy, 2 Timothy, Titus, Philemon, Hebrews, James, 1 Peter, 2 Peter, 1 John, 2 John, 3 John, Jude, Revelation

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Amplified Bible

The Amplified Bible (AMP) is an English translation of the Bible produced jointly by The Zondervan Corporation and The Lockman Foundation. The first edition was published in 1965. It is largely a revision of the American Standard Version of 1901, with reference made to various texts in the original languages. It is designed to "amplify" the text by using a system of punctuation and other typographical features to bring out all shades of meaning present in the original texts.

Al Quran MP3 – Full Quran with Audio, Translation, Tafseer, and Offline Access

Experience the complete Holy Quran in one easy-to-use Islamic app, perfect for Ramadan, daily worship, and every Islamic month. Al Quran MP3 offers full Quran Kareem recitation with MP3 audio, translations in over 20 languages, verse-by-verse Tafseer, and offline reading and listening. Whether you are looking to read, listen, or study the Quran, this app is your trusted Islamic companion for everyday spiritual growth.

This all-in-one app also includes essential Islamic tools like accurate prayer times with Azan notifications, a Qibla direction finder, Islamic calendar with Ramadan and Eid dates, a smart Zakat calculator, daily Duas and Hadith, and an AI-powered Islamic assistant to answer your questions.

Key Features of Al Quran MP3 – القرآن الكريم:

1. Read and Listen to the Full Quran Offline

    Complete Quran with Arabic text and 16-line Mushaf PDF

    High-quality MP3 audio recitation by world-renowned Qaris

    Verse-by-verse audio playback for better memorization

    Offline mode for reading and listening without internet access

2. Quran with Translation in 20+ Languages

    Translations in English, Urdu, Hindi, Bengali, French, Turkish, Indonesian, Persian, and more

    Word-by-word translation for deeper understanding

3. Tafseer for In-Depth Understanding

    Verse-by-verse Tafseer to understand the context and meaning

    Ideal for students, scholars, and daily readers

4. Transliteration for Non-Arabic Speakers

    Romanized Arabic text to help with pronunciation and Tajweed

    Great for beginners learning to read the Quran

5. Quran MP3 Player

    Listen to Quran recitation by multiple famous Qaris

    Supports background audio playback and multitasking

6. Qibla Direction Finder

    Accurate Qibla compass to locate the Kaaba from anywhere

    Works offline and globally

7. Accurate Prayer Times and Azan Alerts

    Real-time prayer timings based on your location

    Azan notifications for all five daily prayers

    Supports global prayer time calculation methods (ISNA, MWL, Umm al-Qura)

8. Zakat Calculator

    Automatically calculate your annual Zakat with support for gold, silver, cash, and assets

    Based on Islamic rules to help ensure accurate Zakat giving

9. Islamic Calendar

    Hijri and Gregorian calendar with key Islamic dates

    Includes Ramadan, Eid, Hajj, and other important events

10. Daily Islamic Content for Spiritual Growth

    Daily Dua, Verse, Hadith, and Surah recommendations

    Stay connected with your faith every day

11. AI Mufti – Ask Islamic Questions Instantly

    Get answers to your Islamic questions using AI-powered technology

    Covers Quranic interpretation, Hadith, Islamic rulings, and more

Why Choose Al Quran MP3 – القرآن الكريم?

    Full offline Quran app with audio

    User-friendly interface for all ages

    Customizable reading experience with font size, color themes, and more

    Designed for daily use, Ramadan, Hifz memorization, and all Islamic months

Al Quran MP3 is more than just a Quran reader or audio player – it’s your complete Islamic app for spiritual growth, learning, and daily worship.

Download Al Quran MP3 – القرآن الكريم now and deepen your connection with the Holy Quran.

developer: SOFTCRAFT SYSTEMS AND SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
description:
We are extremely proud and happy to release The Holy Bible (King James Version) - for iPhone completely offline loaded with user friendly features. The app contains both "Old Testament" and "New Testament" in English language. We sincerely hope that this app will rejoice you and will be more useful in reading the Bible.

* We offer an entirely unique offline Bible study experience that can assist learn and share the Holy Bible verses to your family or friends groups. Compared to the traditional Holy Bible, our e-bible allows you to access The Bible easily on your phone without carrying the Bible, and listen to audio Bible verses while driving and running.

* Our Holy Bible App is an easy, light, offline bible for your daily Bible studies. To enhance your Bible App experience, the app allows you to quickly locate Holy Bible verses with quick options and create your own Holy Bible verse highlights, bookmarks, verse images, and notes. Explore the Holy Bible with your closest friends and family. 

-- FEATURES --

THE BEST AND EASY BIBLE APP

-Access to the Old Testament and New Testament anytime & anywhere.
-Offline: Read and study Bible verses without internet access.
-Search Holy Bible with keywords.
-Search with voice to search fast.
-Quickly locate the verses through our traditional search option.
-Share Bible verses with beloved ones in text format, image (photo) format.
-Design your own share images with multiple photo backgrounds and text edit options.
-Highlight with colour, Bookmark, underline, bold verses you like for future Bible reference.
-Add Notes to verses.

BEST AUDIO BIBLE

-Enjoy your Bible study by playing the Audio Bible.
-Easy navigation options to read the next verse or chapter.
-Create your own Audio Bible "PLAYLISTS" and listen to your favorite Bible verses whenever you are unable to read while driving, running, etc.
-Have a good sleep with God's word playing at night.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR BIBLE APP

-Font setting: choose any font size you want in order to get the most suitable Bible reading experiences.
-Night mode: you can change to night mode when you read the Bible at night or whenever needed.
-Share The Bible verses with your friends and family on social media with ease.

DAILY BIBLE AND READING PLANS

-Get daily verse as notification to your phone in the morning. The time can be customized to your needs.
-Use our reading plans to study The Bible and lead religious life.
-Daily verse menu to refer to the daily verses.
-Menus to refer to the highlighted, bookmarked verses.

With your support, we will keep on upgrading and updating the app to make it the best Bible to read The Holy Bible.

Thank You,

Understand the Quran in your language with Tafsir. Listen to recitations and explore word-by-word meanings and grammar. Search, bookmark, take notes, and track your progress for deeper study.

Listen to beautiful recitations by your favourite Qaris, follow along with tajweed, and read from familiar Mushaf pages, all in one app. This app is completely free with no ads!

Let’s explore how this easy-to-use Quran app will help you connect with the Quran more meaningfully.

Translations, Tafsirs and Surah Info
- Understand the Quran by studying 170+ Translations & Tafsirs of the Quran in 60+ languages: English, Indonesian, Bangla, Hindi, Urdu, German, Chinese, French, Italian, Malay, Russian, Spanish, Tamil, and many more!
- 8 Arabic Tafsirs (including Tafseer Ibn Kathir, Tafseer Tabari, etc.) along with Arabic E3rab, Word Meaning, Asbabun Nuzul
- Surah info: Surah summary and virtues

Word by Word Analysis & Translations
- Read Word by Word translations of the Quran in English, Indonesian, Bangla, German, Hindi, Ingush, Malay, Russian, Tamil, Turkish and Urdu
- Study and analyse Word Root/Lemma, Grammar, Morphology, Occurrences in different forms and Verb Forms to dive in more depth. Helpful to learn & understand Quranic Arabic

Mushaf Mode
- Recite Quran in Mushaf mode to have the same experience when reciting from a hard-copy Mushaf
- Available Mushaf scripts: Madani, Naskh Indopak, Qaloon, Shemerly, Warsh

Library: Bookmarks & Notes
- Bookmark ayahs to your own Collections and keep track of the last read ayah using Pins
- Start reading from where you left off using auto Last Reads
- Reflect and take notes for each ayah (آية)
- Sync library across multiple devices and even share with others using import/export

Search & Quran Subject-wise Topics
- Powerful Search with highlights to quickly find what you are looking for
- Explore by Topics & read the ayahs related to a topic together

Quran Audio
- Listen to Quran recitations by 80+ reciters with Quran audio translation in 10+ languages (downloadable for offline use)
- Reciter Options: Mishary Al Afasy, Husary, Ayman Suwaid, Abdur Rahman As-Sudais and many others
- Powerful Audio System with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in Quran Memorisation/Quran Hifz
- Reciters tagged based on recitation types: Murattal, Mujawwad, Translation
- Arabic Audio Commentary and Quran audio translation in Bangla, English, Urdu others

Quran Planner, Streak and Badges
- Plan your Khatmah of the Quran using the Quran Planner
- Set your daily reading target, track and increase it gradually
- Monitor your weekly activity
- Build a daily Quran reading habit using Streak
- Earn badges for completing Streak Milestones and exploring app features

Various Customisation Options, Tajweed & Others
- Read in Uthmanic or Indopak script
- Read Tafsirs in Tafsir view
- Recite Tajweed colour-coded Quran with ease
- Quran Dictionary: See the list of roots for different Arabic alphabets
- Various fonts and multiple themes, including Night mode
- Autoscroll feature
- Copy & Share the verses
- All feature supports offline (Quran offline)

15+ Languages
- Arabic, English, Bangla, German, French, Bahasa Indonesia / Malay, Russian, Spanish, Tagalog, Turkish, Urdu, and more

Download the ad-free Quran app and start your journey to a deeper understanding of the Quran!

Share and recommend this beautiful app to your friends and family. May Allah bless us in this world and the hereafter.

Allah’s Messenger (pbuh) said: "Whoever calls people to right guidance will have a reward like that of those who follow him..." [Sahih Muslim: 2674]

Your Complete Spiritual Companion 
Holy Quran  is designed for Muslims seeking a seamless, all-in-one app for their spiritual needs. Whether you’re looking for prayer time muslim reminders, salah guide for beginners, or Dhikr tracking, this app brings everything together in a simple and easy-to-use interface. Stay connected with your faith anytime, anywhere. 

Key Features 
Automatic prayer time alarm for all five daily prayers. 
Accurate qibla direction finder for wherever you are. 
Full holy book Quran text for easy reading and recitation. 
High-quality Quran mp3 full offline access to 114 surahs. 
Digital tasbih counter to track your Dhikr effortlessly. 
Morning and evening azkar reminders to keep you spiritually connected. 
Learn and reflect on the 99 names of Allah with meanings and benefits. 

Never Miss a Prayer 
With Holy Quran, you’ll always stay on time for your prayers. The app automatically sends alerts for salah time like Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha, ensuring you never miss an important moment of worship. And with the accurate qibla direction feature, you’ll always know the correct direction to pray, no matter where you are. 

Read and Listen to the Quran 
The app offers both a full al Quran text for easy reading and a complete audio version of all 114 surahs. Whether you prefer to read or listen, you can engage with the holy book Quran in a way that suits your lifestyle. The Quran audio mp3 feature ensures you can access it even when offline. 

Find the Qibla Instantly 
No need to worry about finding the Qibla while traveling or in unfamiliar places. The app’s highly accurate qibla compass direction helps you locate the exact direction for prayer with just one tap, whether you're using it offline or online. 

Simplified Dhikr & Spiritual Growth 
Use the built-in tasbeeh counter to keep track of your Dhikr easily and accurately. Whether you’re at home, traveling, or on the go, this feature helps you stay connected to your faith through daily remembrance. Additionally, explore the 99 names of Allah with meaning to gain deeper insight into their significance and benefits, further enriching your spiritual journey. 

What Sets Us Apart? 
Holy Quran - Deeper Journey offers more than just the basics. We combine offline Quran audio, easy-to-use prayer alarms, and a highly accurate qibla finder in one simple app. It’s designed to be your comprehensive Islamic companion, offering everything you need for your spiritual growth without the hassle of switching between multiple apps. 
Download Holy Quran today and take the next step in your spiritual journey with confidence. All your spiritual tools—prayer time table, Quran reading, and Dhikr tracking—are now in one place, easy, accessible, and reliable. 

Your review is our appreciation. We will try our best to respond to all your contributions and improve the app base on your contributions. Download the Al Quran Sharif Prayer Time and rate 5 our app will be your Islamic companion.

Introducing our Beautiful Hymn application, featuring the cherished Hymns and Canticles of The Methodist Church. Immerse yourself in the anthems of notable associations within the Methodist Church. Discover vital information about The Methodist Church within this comprehensive app.

Share your opinions and suggestions with us, as we value your input and aim to implement them in future updates.

Experience the full range of Methodist hymns (English) with their accompanying tunes. This app also includes Canticles, Wesley hymns and other important Methodist information.

This complete Methodist Church Hymnal is packed with audio tunes, comprising the lyrics and melodies of over 1000 hymns from the British edition of the Methodist Hymnal, used worldwide by Methodist congregations. Additionally, you'll find the Methodist Church Liturgy, Canticles, and extras for worship.

We have created this Methodist audio-tune-hymnal as a free resource for all members of the Church to use in their families, homes, worship, evening talks, or simply to listen and sing-along to their favorite hymn tunes.

Read iconic comic books like Superman, Batman, The Witcher, Invincible, The Boys, Transformers, Hellboy, The Walking Dead, The Umbrella Academy, and more—alongside exciting creator-made comics, manga, webcomics, and graphic novels.


NEW BOOKS DROP WEEKLY
Find new and interesting comics featured every week. Explore our library of 100,000+ releases through curated collections and see which comic books, creators, and themes are trending. Your next favorite is just a tap away.


GC VERTICAL ORIGINALS
Experience amazing comic book stories reimagined for vertical scroll. With over 1,200+ episodes across 30+ series, enjoy daily free episodes and new series weekly from top indie publishers and creators.


350+ PUBLISHERS AND THOUSANDS OF CREATORS
Enjoy comics from publishers including DC, Image Comics, Dark Horse, BOOM! Studios, ONI Press, TOKYOPOP, Mad Cave, and more. Read titles like Justice League, Superman, Nightwing, Joker, The Sandman, Stranger Things, Invincible, Power Rangers, Transformers, The Boys, The Walking Dead, and thousands more.


READING EXPERIENCE YOU'LL LOVE
Customize your experience—whether on phone or tablet, vertical scroll or double-page layout. Engage with comics your way, comment, follow creators, and jump between chapters with ease. For many titles, enjoy our panel-to-panel reading mode for a more cinematic experience.


ADVANCED SEARCH AND DISCOVERY
Find exactly what you’re looking for with powerful filtering by genre, art style, themes, format, audience, and more. Explore by dedicated publisher channels and discover new comic favorites beyond the algorithm.


OFFLINE READING
Take your comics on the go. Download and read offline with a GlobalComix Gold subscription.


TRACK TITLES & ORGANIZE COMICS
Bookmark your comic books with statuses like “Reading,” “On Hold,” or “Read Later.” Get notified about new releases from your favorite comics and creators.


CELEBRATE COMICS AND THE PEOPLE WHO CREATE THEM
GlobalComix is a creator-first platform where publishers and artists can publish directly and earn revenue. Up to 70% of your subscription fee supports the comics you love.


Join us and shape the future of comicbook storytelling.


If you’ve enjoyed reading on platforms like Comixology, you’ll find GlobalComix a fresh, modern experience—built for discovery, community, and reading your way.

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodNovel Bundle to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.
